title: Good Luck
lyrics:
[Intro]
(La la la la la la, uh la la la)
(La la la la la la, uh la la la)
[Verse 1]
This could be a simple conversation
But you don't wanna say what's on your mind
I'm not gonna fix this situation
There's no point in wastin' all my time
[Pre-Chorus]
Tryna make it last, but I'm done with that
If you need your space then I won't hold you back
And I just don't know what you're lookin' for
But good luck, good luck, good luck
[Chorus]
Good luck tryna find somethin' like us
I'm not that worried, I trust
You won't do better than me
When it gets rough
You gon' be missing my love
And when nobody's enough
Can't be the one that you need
[Post-Chorus]
So good luck (La la la la la la, uh la la la)
Good luck (La la la la la la, uh la la la)

[Verse 2]
It's sweet of you to think that you should call me (Call me)
Tellin' me that I'm the one you choose (Choose)
I know I didn't pick up, boy I'm sorry (I'm sorry)
But I'm too busy findin' someone new (New)
[Pre-Chorus]
Tryna make it last, but I'm done with that
If you need your space then I won't hold you back
And I just don't know what you'rе lookin' for
But good luck, good luck, good luck
[Chorus]
Good luck tryna find somethin' like us
I'm not that worried, I trust
You won't do bеtter than me
When it gets rough
You gon' be missing my love
And when nobody's enough
Can't be the one that you need
[Post-Chorus]
So good luck (La la la la la la, uh la la la)
(La la la la la la, uh la la la)
Good luck (La la la la la la, uh la la la)
(La la la la la la, uh la la la)
Good luck, good luck, good Luck

[Bridge]
I tried to make it last, but I'm done with that
And I just don't know what you're lookin' for
But good luck, good luck, good luck
[Chorus]
Good luck tryna find somethin' like us
I'm not that worried, I trust
You won't do better than me
When it gets rough
You gon' be missing my love
And when nobody's enough
Can't be the one that you need
[Post-Chorus]
So good luck (La la la la la la, uh la la la)
(La la la la la la, uh la la la)
Good luck (La la la la la la, uh la la la)
(La la la la la la, uh la la la)
Good luck, good luck, good luck
